text: The Lulua River in the Kasai catchment (center right) Lulua River is a river in the Congo basin in Africa situated in the Democratic Republic of Congo. It is a right tributary of the Kasai River. In 2015, a new species of fish called Hypsopanchax stiassnyae was found living in this river. Category:Rivers of the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: Lulua River
